item.title: workshops
item.description: Hello! I’m now offering a wide range of workshops both online and in-person, tailored specifically to your learning needs. With my background as a data scientist in a linguistics department, I’ve had the chance to collaborate with dozens of research projects, and support over 50 students in achieving their research goals, in addition to teaching hundreds more. My workshops delve into the fascinating world of quantitative methods, from introductory short courses on linear regression and linear mixed effect models to the more intricate generalized additive mixed models (GAMMs).
